overview:
Gary Lang serves as the CTO of SaaS Capital and brings over 23 years of technology experience to the company as well as a first hand perspective to the challenges facing SaaS providers.

Gary’s expertise is in leading software development teams and building IT infrastructure. Most recently Gary built Skybus Airlines’ IT infrastructure. As a startup airline, Skybus utilized several SaaS applications to quickly go from the planning stage to an operating airline. Skybus’s IT infrastructure was a blend of on-premise applications and SaaS applications giving Gary insight to running a data center and being a SaaS customer.

Previous to this, Gary has been an IT consultant to large and small companies and spent seventeen years at Attachmate Corporation, spending the last eight in product development management overseeing software development staffs responsible for a $100 million product line.

Gary earned his BS in Electrical Engineering Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
